## Type of change

- [ ] New workflow
- [ ] Bug fix for existing workflow

## Checklist

- [ ] I've removed any personal data, API keys, or credentials from the workflow JSON
- [ ] I've tested the workflow in my n8n instance
- [ ] I've updated the README if adding a new workflow
- [ ] Node names are clear and descriptive
- [ ] User-configurable values are in a single "Set Parameters" node (for new workflows)
